ingredient-information.sestavine: Butane, Isobutane, Propane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Aluminum Chlorohydrate, PPG-14 Butyl Ether, Parfum, Disteardimonium Hectorite, BHT, Propylene Carbonate, Dimethiconol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Gelatin Crosspolymer, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Hydrated Silica, Aqua, Sodium Starch Octenylsuccinate, Maltodextrin, Hydrolysed Corn Starch Octenylsuccinate, Silica, Benzyl Alcohol, Hexyl Cinnamal.

product-info.opis: Ostanite sveži ves dan z Rexona deodorantom v spreju. Ta antiperspirantni deodorant s svežim vonjem po modrem maku in jabolku ščiti pred potenjem 48 ur.
